tool_description: Get evergreen blogs for your mobile apps.

api_list.name: Latest Posts
api_list.description: Retrieve all blogs ordered by the latest publication date first.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Specify the order of the blogs based on publication date.

api_list.name: Blogs by category
api_list.description: Fetch all blogs from a specific category using its ID.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The ID of the category to retrieve blogs from.

api_list.name: Search Tags
api_list.description: Get all blogs that include a specific tag.

required_parameters.name: tags__icontains
required_parameters.description: The tag to search for in the blogs.

api_list.name: Single Category
api_list.description: Retrieve details of a single category, including its thumbnail and description.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the category to retrieve.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: List all available categories from the BlogsAPI.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for blogs using a specific keyword.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The keyword to search for in the blogs.

api_list.name: Single blog
api_list.description: Retrieve details of a single blog post using its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve.

api_list.name: All blogs
api_list.description: Retrieve all blogs, paginated in sets of 20.
